ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hey there everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Welcome back! I play several characters on The Tribunal. Conwyn is my main. 54 cleric. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
> I'm back everyone. The last time I was a part of this group, I was
> driven away due to a misunderstanding. After that, the owner and I
> have made some-what of a friendship and I decided to give the group
> another try. It is, after all, the only decent EverQuest group at
> Yahoo! and I was disappointed that I had to leave in the first
> place. So, I'm glad to be back. First comes first, what servers do
> you all play on?
>
> -= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
> -= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
> -= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
>
Welcome back! I play several characters on The Tribunal.
Conwyn is my main. 54 cleric.
luv,
-Su
